mapper.select: SELECT P.PLACE_ID, P.PLACE_NAME, P.PLACE_ADDRESS, P.PLACE_DETAILS, (SELECT PI.uploadPath FROM PLACE_IMGS PI WHERE PI.PLACE_ID = P.PLACE_ID AND ROWNUM = 1) AS IMAGE_PATH FROM PLACE p ORDER BY PLACE_VIEWS DESC

SELECT P.PLACE_ID, P.PLACE_NAME, P.PLACE_ADDRESS, P.PLACE_DETAILS, (SELECT PI.uploadPath FROM PLACE_IMGS PI WHERE PI.PLACE_ID = P.PLACE_ID AND ROWNUM = 1) AS IMAGE_PATH, NVL(COUNT(PP.PICK_ID), 0) AS PICK_COUNT FROM PLACE P LEFT JOIN PLACE_PICK PP ON P.PLACE_ID = PP.PLACE_ID GROUP BY P.PLACE_ID, P.PLACE_NAME, P.PLACE_ADDRESS, P.PLACE_DETAILS ORDER BY PICK_COUNT DESC
select P.* from PlACE P where P.PLACE_ID=#{placeID}
select PI.* from PlACE_IMGS PI where PI.PLACE_ID=#{placeId}

SELECT P.PLACE_ID, P.PLACE_NAME, P.PLACE_ADDRESS, P.PLACE_DETAILS, (SELECT PI.uploadPath FROM PLACE_IMGS PI WHERE PI.PLACE_ID = P.PLACE_ID AND ROWNUM = 1) AS IMAGE_PATH FROM PLACE P WHERE P.PLACE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR P.PLACE_ADDRESS LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR P.PLACE_DETAILS LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
